---
category: news
title: "Thoothukudi district introduces AI-based mobile app to detect cataract patients"
excerpt: "Since the district is estimated to be housing over 16,000 cataract patients, the AI-based mobile app, ‘E-Paarvai’ Cataract Detection and Screening System, has been launched to identify the people with this defect and give them appropriate treatment."
